file_insights.purpose: Circular progress ring component for displaying project progress
key_features: Support for label and subtitle text

patterns_discovered.description: Well-defined TypeScript interface for component props with optional fields using defaults
patterns_discovered.evidence: ProjectProgressRingProps interface with sensible defaults (size=120, color='primary', showPercentage=true)

patterns_discovered.description: Input validation by clamping values to acceptable range
patterns_discovered.evidence: Math.min(100, Math.max(0, value)) to ensure value stays within 0-100

patterns_discovered.description: Using MUI Box and Typography components for layout and text styling
patterns_discovered.evidence: Box with flex layout, Typography variants for different text hierarchy levels

patterns_discovered.description: Optional label and subtitle rendering based on props
Component wraps and enhances existing CircularProgressDisplay component
patterns_discovered.evidence: Imports and uses CircularProgressDisplay with configured props

gotchas_discovered.description: CircularProgressDisplay imported from '../src/components/ui/ProgressBar' which suggests potential path issues depending on build configuration
gotchas_discovered.impact: May cause module resolution issues if the relative path doesn't match actual directory structure

gotchas_discovered.description: Progress ring thickness is hard-coded to 6 with no way to customize
gotchas_discovered.impact: Limited customization options for visual appearance

gotchas_discovered.description: Gap between elements is hard-coded to 2 (theme spacing units) with no customization
gotchas_discovered.impact: Spacing cannot be adjusted per use case

gotchas_discovered.description: Subtitle uses mt: -1 to adjust spacing, suggesting potential layout refinement needed
gotchas_discovered.impact: Fragile spacing that may break with different content or theme changes

approach_outcome.summary: ProjectProgressRing component created successfully with proper TypeScript typing, value normalization, conditional rendering, and Material-UI integration
approach_outcome.implementation_notes: First attempt succeeded; component follows React best practices with clear prop interface and sensible defaults

recommendations.suggestion: Verify import path for CircularProgressDisplay component
recommendations.rationale: The '../src/components/ui/ProgressBar' import path may be problematic depending on build configuration

recommendations.suggestion: Add thickness and gap as optional props with sensible defaults
recommendations.rationale: Would increase component customization without breaking existing usage

recommendations.suggestion: Replace negative margin hack (mt: -1) with proper flexbox gap configuration
recommendations.rationale: Would improve spacing robustness and maintainability

recommendations.suggestion: Add JSDoc comments documenting prop types and usage examples
recommendations.rationale: Would improve developer experience and component discoverability
